attributes.review:
App caused me so much emotional distress my kids ended up having seizures. My husband had to seek medical attention dialing from his butt. You heard that right, pulled out a home phone right out of his butt and used his shaft to dial 911. This needs to end or you will be hearing from my lawyers! 

Sincerely,
Karen Wartzenhimer
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Trump having his own app for his own little ecochamber is laughable. Republicans love to talk about how biased CNN, and then will turn around and download an app meant to convince (AHEM! Brainwash) them into voting for him. Trump doesn’t care about America. He doesn’t care about its Civilians. If he did, he wouldn’t call climate change a hoax. He wouldn’t try to say that the number of high cases of Corona shouldn’t scare you. Instead of taking responsibility and keeping all states locked down, he leaves it up to the states, under the gauze of “federalism🤪.” This May surprise people, but all it takes is one person with corona out of state to come in state to resurge the cases. If he really cared about making jobs, he wouldn’t try to keep trans people from serving in the military. He wouldn’t try to allow businesses to keep discriminating against LGBT people. This is a man who has a baseball worth $88 dollars. The app itself asks you to text 88022. 88 is an infamous dog whistle because H is the 8th letter in the alphabet. 88=HH which is code for, well “Hail Hitler.” You can’t get more on the nose than that. If he cared about Americans and what they have to say, he wouldn’t have initiated “Martials Law” on Antifa. Antifa is not an organization, it’s an ideology for “anti fascism.” That sounds bad until you realize that fascist are people like Mussolini and Hitler. So essentially, Trump is calling Anti Fascist the bad guys and Pro Fascist the good guys. Excuse me?!?!?! And let’s not forget that Ronald Regan tried to do the same things against liberals, except instead of calling them anti fascist, he called them communist. If that’s not enough to convince you that Trump only cares about himself and his hateful ideologies, I don’t know what to tell you. Even if you’re Republican, you are still a human.And you should realize that what Trump has done, is doing, and will continue to do is incredibly fricked. Go research why people aren’t voting for trump. Listen to them instead of writing everyone who disagrees with you as a “libtard.”
attributes.title: If you vote for him again, you’re a white supremacist
